attributes.action: Make It Law That Every Household Should Have A Minimum Of 1 Jeff Healey Album
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jeff Healey is simply amazing.

He can play guitar, trumpet and a few more things, and he is completely blind.

It should therefore be used to educate youths that listen to computer generated music what REAL music actually is.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
